src:
Creating Rain and Splash Effects
02 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Steve Lund
Steve Lund writes:
Learn how to create animated rain and splash effects in Blender 2.8! Using some cool techniques involving dynamic paint, fluid simulations, and particles! Works in Eevee and Cycles.
